string.description: Progress Content: text in progress dialog

string.name: move_to_hidden_zone_success_one
string.description: Toast: move to recycle bin success. %s is variable string.

resources.string: "\"%s\" has been moved to Hidden Cabinet."

string.name: move_to_hidden_zone_success_more
string.description: Toast: move to recycle bin success

resources.string: "The selected files have been moved to Hidden Cabinet."

string.name: can_not_open_in_hidden_zone
string.description: Toast: can not open in hidden zone

resources.string: "Hide your private files in Hidden Cabinet. PIN code is required to open Hidden Cabinet."
"Please setup an email account to retrieve your PIN-code"
"Enable fingerprint to unlock? Hidden Cabinet supports fingerprint verification. Scan your fingerprint in Settings to get started."
"Lock Hidden Cabinet when the device is locked"
